title.bibl: La Parola dei Socialisti, July 11, 1908. [Bertelli and Caroti to Address Meeting]

div.bibl: La Parola dei Socialisti, July 11, 1908. [BERTELLI AND CAROTI TO ADDRESS MEETING]

body.p: The Italian Socialist section of the twelfth ward at its meeting on July 1st decided to ask the nineteenth ward section for a one day loan of the two propagandists, Comrades Bertelli and Caroti, so that they may speak at an open-air meeting on the West Side.
It also decided to join the nineteenth ward section in participating in the excursion to Milwaukee which is planned by the Socialists of Cook County for Sunday, July 12.
In Milwaukee Comrade Debs will speak in English, and Comrade Bertelli in Italian.
